title: Like Radicals
text: For two like radicals, $$a \sqrt[n]{x}-b \sqrt[n]{x}$$ is equivalent to $$\left(a-b\right) \sqrt[n]{x}$$
speech: For two like radicals,  a the n-th root of x minus b the n-th root of x  is equivalent to  parentheses a minus b,  times the n-th root of x
pacedSpeech: For two like radicals,   a the n-th root of x minus b the n-th root of x
is equivalent to    a minus b,  times the n-th root of x
